title: Create a new liquidity pool
description: Create a new liquidity pool by converting an existing user issued asset into a pool share asset. Liquidity pools can swap any two assets on the blockchain with your own fee configuration.
taker_fee_content: Percentage charged to takers when they trade against your pool. Enter a value between 0 and 100.
withdrawal_fee_content: Percentage charged when liquidity is withdrawn from the pool. Enter a value between 0 and 100.
noEligibleAssets: No eligible assets available to create a liquidity pool with, it must be an user issued asset with no issued supply.
assetA_description: This is the first asset in the trading pair for the liquidity pool.
assetB_description: This is the second asset in the trading pair for the liquidity pool.
